jobDescription: Titan Urban Transportation Inc. is looking for more professional drivers to meet the transportation needs of its ever increasing clientele. Clients can book us through the phone, website, or app meaning you stay busy and on the cutting edge of the transportation industry. Our fleet consists of brand new luxury BMW and Mercedes vehicles and we pay all expenses. If you’re a chauffeur who take your job seriously, dresses well, and is on time every time apply today and be part of the next big thing in the transportation industry! Part time, full time, and salary positions availible. $15-$18/hour based on experience, plus tips.Complete on Glassdoor or email your resume to employment@titanurban.com SPECIFIC JOB REQUIREMENTS: -Valid California license. -Minimum 25 years of age (commercial insurance regulations.) -Clean DMV record. -Must pass a pre-employment drug and alcohol screening and be subjected to random testing during employment. -Excellent knowledge of the Bay Area including all airports. -Must have a Professional demeanor and excellent customer service at all times. -Must maintain a professional appearance at all times (suit and tie are mandatory); -Must have reliable transportation to and from work. Required experience: 1 year Required language: English
